games.title: Rent
games.description: How an ordinary person try to earn enough money to survive and pay the rent in 2022 London.

games.title: Rose of Remembrance
games.description: A first person, story driven, puzzle game. Dr. Reed’s first contract is to craft a Memory Rose for Ashe. The client is Ashe’s mother, Gloria.

games.title: Tavern Tale
games.description: Explore a fantasy realm and uncover the inner workings of a lowley tavern. Make your own choices, and let a die roll.

games.title: The Variable
games.description: A stealth game where you infiltrate the simulation as the variable.  Your objective is to eliminate the VIP without being spotted and get out.

games.title: Rotate
games.description: A physics-based party game. Rotate the hammer and smash everything with it!

games.title: The Tale of the Singing Peaks
games.description: A narrative pixel-art platformer that takes you on a spooky psychological journey of body and mind.

games.title: SolarGram's Fix It Shop
games.credit: Skylar Law, Katharina Trappe, Anukriti Gupta, Vlad Chandran
games.description: Embark on a solarpunk journey as you take over your grandmother's iconic repair shop on a post-climate-disaster Earth in this unique mechanic simulator.

games.title: Interstellar Adventure
games.credit: Cheng Min, Ziwei Su,  Dixuan Xu
games.description: RPG Sokoban game: collecting crystals to repair their damaged spaceship and embark on a journey home.

games.title: One Night
games.description: A pixel-art narrative game about the discovery of a family memory.

games.title: Sixteen Point Sixty Seven Percent
games.description: An isometric narrative-driven RPG. Participate in a game of Russian roulette. Uncover your past. With a gun in hand, roll the dice of fate.

games.title: LostHeart
games.description: An ARPG game set on a tiny open-world island where you can have fun gliding, swimming, enjoying many interesting events and revealing the island's secrets.

games.title: Dose99
games.description: A survival game which goes back to early 2000s and test players' endurance.

games.title: The Goat Archive
games.description: A narrative game about the discovery of a hidden secret.

games.title: Forest Warfare
games.description: Fast-paced forest duel: Build, Battle, Conquer! Utilize unique skills, seize resources, protect your base, claim victory!

games.title: Froggy Duo
games.description: Froggy Duo is a casual two-player cooperative game. Players take on the roles of two croaking frogs embarking on an adventure in the jungle.

games.title: Call of Interview
games.description: A turn-based tactical games with various skill combination and unique 2.5D art style.

games.title: Fetility, Crime, and Economy
games.description: City management game where players try to save a city by deciding what policies should be enacted. Managing the balance between funds, population, and crime.
